publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2579 Margaret Jamieson: Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran—That the Parliament congratulates Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran which celebrates having trained 30,000 members of the public in emergency life support since its inception in 1995; commends the dedication of the 66 volunteer instructors, and welcomes the British Heart Foundation’s schools initiative, enabling 106 teachers to be trained as instructors and young people from 24 schools in Ayrshire and Arran to be trained in emergency life support. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2579 Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran (lodged on 14 March 2005) Bill Butler*, Mike Watson*, Eleanor Scott*, David Mundell*, Scott Barrie*, Alex Neil*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Jackie Baillie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Murray Tosh*, John Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Campbell Martin*, Ms Sandra White*, Karen Gillon*, Sarah Boyack*, Nora Radcliffe*, Rob Gibson*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-2579 Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran (lodged on 14 March 2005) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Janis Hughes*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Trish Godman*
S2M-2579 Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran (lodged on 14 March 2005) Mr David Davidson*, Phil Gallie*

S2M-2579 Margaret Jamieson: Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran—That the Parliament congratulates Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran which celebrates having trained 30,000 members of the public in emergency life support since its inception in 1995; commends the dedication of the 66 volunteer instructors, and welcomes the British Heart Foundation’s schools initiative, enabling 106 teachers to be trained as instructors and young people from 24 schools in Ayrshire and Arran to be trained in emergency life support. Supported by: Bill Butler, Mike Watson, Eleanor Scott, David Mundell, Scott Barrie, Alex Neil, Mr Jamie Stone, Jackie Baillie, Dr Elaine Murray, Murray Tosh, John Scott, Tommy Sheridan, Campbell Martin, Ms Sandra White, Karen Gillon, Sarah Boyack, Nora Radcliffe, Rob Gibson, Maureen Macmillan, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Janis Hughes, Mrs Nanette Milne, Trish Godman, Mr David Davidson, Phil Gallie
S2M-2579 Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran (lodged on 14 March 2005) Margaret Mitchell*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2579 Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran (lodged on 14 March 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2579 Heartstart Ayrshire and Arran (lodged on 14 March 2005) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*
